edits.oldString: important: 'Important: PEM is the hallmark symptom of ME/CFS. If present, avoid activities that consistently trigger symptom worsening. Energy management and pacing are key treatment strategies.',
edits.newString: important: 'NICE NG206: PEM is a core diagnostic criterion for ME/CFS. The NICE guideline emphasizes that people with ME/CFS should not use more energy than they perceive they have and should not "push through" their symptoms. Energy management is the recommended approach.';
